name: phonemically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to the phonemes (= the smallest units of speech) of a language: The two words are phonemically equivalent. We wrote down every word phonemically, along with a description of how it was used.
More examplesFewer examplesThis sound is not present phonemically in my native language.The lecturer pointed out that phonemically similar items often share the same vowel. Chinese characters can be read with six phonemically contrastive tones.This system spells Spanish words phonemically.
